installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# steamcmd Base Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
# Image to install with is 'ghcr.io/pterodactyl/installers:debian'
apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl lib32gcc-s1 ca-certificates

## just in case someone removed the defaults.
if [ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]; then
    echo -e "steam user is not set.\n"
    echo -e "Using anonymous user.\n"
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
else
    echo -e "user set to ${STEAM_USER}"
fi

## download and install steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

## install game using steamcmd
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} ${EXTRA_FLAGS} validate +quit ## other flags may be needed depending on install. looking at you cs 1.6

## set up 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## set up 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

## RUST specific setup
cd /mnt/server
mkdir -p server/${RUST_SERVER_IDENTITY}
mkdir -p server/${RUST_SERVER_IDENTITY}/cfg

echo "Creating rust server identity files"
echo "server.ip 0.0.0.0" > server/${RUST_SERVER_IDENTITY}/cfg/server.cfg
echo "server.port ${SERVER_PORT}" >> server/${RUST_SERVER_IDENTITY}/cfg/server.cfg
echo "server.hostname \"${RUST_SERVER_NAME}\"" >> server/${RUST_SERVER_IDENTITY}/cfg/server.cfg
echo "server.identity \"${RUST_SERVER_IDENTITY}\"" >> server/${RUST_SERVER_IDENTITY}/cfg/server.cfg
echo "server.seed ${RUST_SERVER_SEED}" >> server/${RUST_SERVER_IDENTITY}/cfg/server.cfg
echo "server.maxplayers ${RUST_SERVER_MAXPLAYERS}" >> server/${RUST_SERVER_IDENTITY}/cfg/server.cfg
echo "server.worldsize ${RUST_SERVER_WORLDSIZE}" >> server/${RUST_SERVER_IDENTITY}/cfg/server.cfg
echo "server.saveinterval 300" >> server/${RUST_SERVER_IDENTITY}/cfg/server.cfg
echo "rcon.ip 0.0.0.0" >> server/${RUST_SERVER_IDENTITY}/cfg/server.cfg
echo "rcon.port ${RCON_PORT}" >> server/${RUST_SERVER_IDENTITY}/cfg/server.cfg
echo "rcon.password \"${RCON_PASSWORD}\"" >> server/${RUST_SERVER_IDENTITY}/cfg/server.cfg
echo "rcon.web 1" >> server/${RUST_SERVER_IDENTITY}/cfg/server.cfg

echo "Installing oxide..."
cd /tmp
curl -sSL "https://github.com/OxideMod/Oxide.Rust/releases/latest/download/Oxide.Rust-linux.zip" -o oxide.zip
unzip -o -d /mnt/server oxide.zip
rm oxide.zip

echo "Installation complete."
